title: Sam's Story
description: Samantha Rayne is ready for college! She wants out of her small town in rural Pennsylvania and wants in on big city life. When she arrives in Massachusetts is when the fun begins. Her roommate becomes her best friend and helps Sam find her true love. Unfortunately for Sam, the journey to true love and happiness is not without problems. Sam is surrounded by cheating, lying, and heartache throughout her journey. Torn between men, Sam needs to find herself before she can commit to just one. Sam's struggle with life helps her find her inner strength and decide which guy is truly her soul mate.
author: Nikki D. Walker
